properties.areaDesc: Harbor Beach to Port Sanilac MI; Outer Saginaw Bay SW of Alabaster to Port Austin MI to Inner Saginaw Bay; Port Sanilac to Port Huron MI; Port Austin to Harbor Beach MI
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 19 at 3:40AM EST until January 20 at 5:00AM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Expect sustained winds up to 22 knots from the
northwest with gusts up to 31 knots. The largest significant
waves will be 7 feet with a potential maximum wave height of
10 feet.

* WHERE...Outer Saginaw Bay SW of Alabaster to Port Austin MI to
Inner Saginaw Bay, Port Austin to Harbor Beach MI, Harbor
Beach to Port Sanilac MI and Port Sanilac to Port Huron MI.

* WHEN...The maximum winds are expected around 5 AM EST Sunday
with the largest waves expected around 5 PM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM EST MONDAY... ...GALE WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 4 AM EST EARLY THIS MORNING
